annonstext:
As a Senior DevOps Engineer, you will be part of our development team! You will be working with the latest technologies and methodologies to design, implement, and maintain the systems, and services, achieving a true always-online platform with minimum interruptions.

We think the ideal candidate effectively communicates complex technical concepts, is comfortable working autonomously and is passionate about engineering perfection, performance, and quality.

Key Qualifications

	5+ years of development and DevOps experience
	Excellent Python, bash, NodeJS, Java and Javascript skills
	Extensive experience in managing applications on GCP
	Proficient with containerization and cluster management technologies like Docker and Kubernetes
	Able to build tools from scratch when needed (Python/Javascript)
	Continually improve CI/CD tools, processes, and procedures

Skills:

	Java
	React.js
	GCP / AWS
	Oracle RDB database
	OpenVMS as an operating system 
	DCL script · Web services 
	JSON RPC 2.0 and SOAP 
	Jira and IBM Rational ClearQuest
	GitHub and IBM Rational ClearCase
	Coming OS and database are: Linux · PostgreSQL

We are looking for Senior software developers with DevOps experience for our team in Skåne. We have internal projects and customers in different industries, ranging from IT, Retail, CRM to Law. Geographically, this may mean that you can get to work both in-house at our headquarters in Malmö or at the customer site.

The role of senior software developers is to participate in our customer's development project and develop the architecture and software platforms ranging from simple to sophisticated multi-processor solutions. You will work on exciting projects in all phases of product development. You thrive in group work with talented colleagues on projects with high speed!
annonstextFormaterad:
As a Senior DevOps Engineer, you will be part of our development team! You will be working with the latest technologies and methodologies to design, implement, and maintain the systems, and services, achieving a true always-online platform with minimum interruptions.

We think the ideal candidate effectively communicates complex technical concepts, is comfortable working autonomously and is passionate about engineering perfection, performance, and quality.

Key Qualifications

  • 5+ years of development and DevOps experience
  • Excellent Python, bash, NodeJS, Java and Javascript skills
  • Extensive experience in managing applications on GCP
  • Proficient with containerization and cluster management technologies like Docker and Kubernetes
  • Able to build tools from scratch when needed (Python/Javascript)
  • Continually improve CI/CD tools, processes, and procedures

Skills:

  • Java
  • React.js
  • GCP / AWS
  • Oracle RDB database
  • OpenVMS as an operating system
  • DCL script · Web services
  • JSON RPC 2.0 and SOAP
  • Jira and IBM Rational ClearQuest
  • GitHub and IBM Rational ClearCase
  • Coming OS and database are: Linux · PostgreSQL

We are looking for Senior software developers with DevOps experience for our team in Skåne. We have internal projects and customers in different industries, ranging from IT, Retail, CRM to Law. Geographically, this may mean that you can get to work both in-house at our headquarters in Malmö or at the customer site.

The role of senior software developers is to participate in our customer's development project and develop the architecture and software platforms ranging from simple to sophisticated multi-processor solutions. You will work on exciting projects in all phases of product development. You thrive in group work with talented colleagues on projects with high speed!

Öppen för alla Vi fokuserar på din kompetens, inte dina övriga förutsättningar. Vi är öppna för att anpassa rollen eller arbetsplatsen efter dina behov.

utbildningsniva.namn: Eftergymnasial utbildning två år eller längre
